main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Damon, Texas on September 3, 1964, observed from a patrol car.
interesting points: The report includes a damaged car with the names Miley, Leach, and Goode mentioned., Law enforcement officers were present during the sighting., Multiple photographs were taken, showing the area and perspectives from the patrol car., There are views of both South and North along Highway 36 documented in the report., The report references the observation of an object looking towards a pasture where it was seen.
